page.title: 07JOHN AT THE FARM,GILSTEAD
page.content: In a morning I go down to{the farm}and then let the dog go out so it goes to {round the cows up.}They can go in for {milking,}as we muck out.We get a full wheelbarrow and then go up this steep ramp to a muckspreader.All the muck goes in to the muckspreader.It is all ready so we go back on the tractor. After,we have our breakfast at home and then we go{muckspreading.}Iknow muckspreaading is done because it all makes the grass grow better for cattle grazing. We go down Sheriff Lane and it is an old bumpy road. Then we went {walling}in the landrover.There were some nettles near the wall.The stones had fallen down and we built it up without cement.We went back in the landrover to put on the trailer for the auction.At the{cattle auction}my Dad bought a cow.It was at Otley and cost more than a hundred pounds.
